trans-unit.source: * Add a comparison with the official client to the docs.

trans-unit.source: * Add docs about upgrading from pyes.

*添加跨多个节点的负载平衡。

trans-unit.source: * Add support for client certificates via the ``client_cert`` arg.

trans-unit.target: *通过ca_certs arg添加对自定义证书颁发机构的支持

trans-unit.target: *将用户名，密码和端口kwargs添加到构造函数中，这样您就不必

trans-unit.source: * All exceptions are now more introspectable, because they don't
trans-unit.target: *所有异常现在都更加自省，因为它们不会

trans-unit.source: * Automatically convert ``datetime`` objects when encoding JSON.
* Brings tests up to date with ``update_aliases()`` API change.
trans-unit.target: *使用“ update_aliases（）” API更改使测试保持最新。

trans-unit.source: * Catch non-JSON responses properly, and raise the more specific
trans-unit.target: *正确捕获非JSON响应，并提出更具体的要求

trans-unit.source: * Change endpoint of bulk indexing so it works on ES < 0.18.
trans-unit.target: *更改批量索引编制的端点，使其适用于ES <0.18。

trans-unit.source: * Correct a typo in the ``bulk()`` docs.
* Correct the ``requests`` requirement to require a version that has everything
trans-unit.target: *更正``请求''要求以要求包含所有内容的版本

trans-unit.source: * Crash harder if JSON encoding fails: that always indicates a bug in
trans-unit.target: *如果JSON编码失败，则崩溃更严重：始终表明存在错误

trans-unit.source: * Deprecate ``bulk_index()`` in favor of the more capable ``bulk()``.
trans-unit.target: *不推荐使用bulk_index（），而使用功能更强大的bulk（）。

trans-unit.source: * Don't crash when the ``query_params`` kwarg is omitted from calls to
trans-unit.target: *当对的调用中省略了``query_params`` kwarg时，请不要崩溃

trans-unit.source: * Failed-node marking to avoid downed nodes for a period
trans-unit.target: *故障节点标记可避免一段时间内发生节点故障

trans-unit.source: * Fix ``delete_by_query()`` to work with ES 1.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: *修复``delete_by_query（）``以与ES 1.0及更高版本一起使用。

trans-unit.source: * Fix a bug in which specifying ``_all`` as an index name sometimes caused
trans-unit.target: *修复了有时导致将_all指定为索引名称的错误

trans-unit.target: *修复了0.4版本中引入的错误，该错误在将“ None”意外发送给ES

trans-unit.source: * Fix all tests that were failing on modern versions of ES.
trans-unit.target: *修复在现代ES版本上失败的所有测试。

trans-unit.source: * HTTP basic auth and HTTPS support
* Handle JSON translation of Decimal class and sets.

trans-unit.target: *在可以采用一个或多个索引的例程中，不需要

* Make ``more_like_this()`` take an arbitrary request body so you can filter
